arts.ttl: Is the Argentina era over? What's behind Brazil's slump? Big questions from CONMEBOL World Cup qualifying
arts.sum: After the latest frantic burst of games, what are the big questions hanging over South American teams in their push to reach the 2026 World Cup?

arts.ttl: Brazil booed by furious fans after draw with Uruguay in World Cup qualifying
arts.sum: Supporters in Salvador aired their frustration after a match of few opportunities ended 1-1

arts.ttl: Darwin Nunez BOMBSHELL: Premier League giants urged to sign Liverpool flop
arts.sum: Mikel Arteta has been urged to sign Liverpool flop Darwin Nunez by former Arsenal striker Jeremie Aliadiere. When asked who Arsenal should sign to fix their striker woes, Aliadiere, who made 29 senior appearances for the Gunners, replied: “I know he is at Liverpool but I am a massive fan of Darwin Nunez.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid midfielder Federico Valverde 'turned down' by Arsenal prior to Spain move
arts.sum: Real Madrid midfielder Federico Valverde reveals that he had wanted to sign for Arsenal during a trial period as a teenager.

arts.ttl: Official: Real Madrid star undergoes successful surgery
arts.sum: La Liga giants Real Madrid have on Tuesday announced that Éder Militão has undergone a successful surgical procedure on his knee. Defender Militão, for his part, was of course condemned…

arts.ttl: Brazil sixth in World Cup qualification group - what’s going wrong for the Samba boys?
arts.sum: Brazil have always been a nation synonymous with the beautiful game. They have won five World Cups - more than any other country - and they usually win it in style. Famous for tricks, flicks and...

arts.ttl: Manuel Ugarte makes feelings clear on Ruben Amorim's first controversial Man Utd decision
arts.sum: Manchester United have already shaken things up since the arrival of new head coach Ruben Amorim, but not all of the decisions made recently have been universally popular

arts.ttl: When is Brazil vs Uruguay? Times, how to watch on TV and stream online
arts.sum: Brazil will bid to avenge their Copa América exit to Uruguay when they host La Celeste in South America’s World Cup qualifying competition. The CONMEBOL 2026 World Cup qualifier between Brazil and Uruguay will be played at Arena Fonte Nova in Bahía, Brazil, on Tuesday November 19, 2024.

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola to Brazil rumour picks up steam as Ronaldo plots audacious reunion with Barcelona buddy
arts.sum: The Selecao legend wants to be reunited with his former Barcelona teammate

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola to Brazil? Legendary striker 'plotting ambitions reunion' with Man City manager
arts.sum: Football icon Ronaldo is reportedly keen to hire Man City's Pep Guardiola as Brazil's national team manager if he takes over as president of the Brazilian Football Confederation.
